subject: Delegation of Power pertaining to Payment for Joint Measurement Survey (JMS).
text: HRrf <747y rTHNf wfarrut TI / Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Tsq5 4dev 8 RTTArf HA14) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) ffl-5 Ua 6, #4-10, ETaT, Tf faff- 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Delegation of Power /2021 Policy Circular No. 7.1.68 dated 5th January, 2021 (Decision taken on e-office file No. 42676 ) Sub:: Delegation of Power pertaining to Payment for Joint Measurement Survey (JMS): Wherever the conduction of Joint Measurement Survey (JMS) is not in the Scope of DPR Consultant,it has been decided to re-delegate the following power , presently vested with RO to the Project Director in partial modification of Circular No_ 11041/217/2007-Admn: dated 30.09.2013: Sl Subject Present NNew delegation] Remarks No_ delegation IPayment for Joint RO Project Authority to IMeasurement Survey Director sanction JMS ((JMS) kcharges as per rates Ipayable under State Govt.
